meanings.definition: A type of tropical plant with large, glossy leaves.
meanings.sent1: I have a beautiful monstera in my living room.
meanings.sent2: The monsteras in the botanical garden are thriving.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to climb the monstera but got tangled in its leaves.
meanings.sent4: Her love for monsteras grew as big as their leaves.
meanings.sent5: The monstera's vibrant green leaves brightened up the room.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'monstera', referring to multiple plants of this type.
meanings.sent1: She bought two monsteras to decorate her office.
meanings.sent2: The garden center had a sale on monsteras this weekend.
meanings.sent3: The monsteras in the greenhouse whispered secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: Their collection of monsteras turned their home into a jungle oasis.
meanings.sent5: The monsteras' leaves danced in the gentle breeze.
